# `MultipleFilesUploadState`

## Parameters

---

**<span className="parameter-name">isUploading</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>boolean</code>

Returns `true` when the files are being uploaded.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">progress</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>null &#124; number</code>

Returns the overall progress of the upload, from 0 to 100. Returns null if the upload has not started yet.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">files</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>Array&lt;ActorRefWithDeprecatedState&lt;FileUploadContext, { type: "ADD", file: File, id: string, bucketId: string, name: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_PROGRESS", progress: number, loaded: number, additions: number } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_DONE", id: string, bucketId: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_ERROR", error: ErrorPayload } &#124; { type: "CANCEL" } &#124; { type: "DESTROY" } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD", file: File, id: string, name: string, bucketId: string } &amp; FileUploadConfig, { value: any, context: FileUploadContext }, ResolveTypegenMeta&lt;Typegen0, { type: "ADD", file: File, id: string, bucketId: string, name: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_PROGRESS", progress: number, loaded: number, additions: number } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_DONE", id: string, bucketId: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_ERROR", error: ErrorPayload } &#124; { type: "CANCEL" } &#124; { type: "DESTROY" } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD", file: File, id: string, name: string, bucketId: string } &amp; FileUploadConfig, BaseActionObject, ServiceMap&gt;&gt;&gt;</code>

The list of file uploads. The properties can be accessed through `item.getSnapshot()` of with the `useFileUploadItem` hook.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">isError</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>boolean</code>

Returns `true` when all upload request are processed, but at least one of them has failed.

---

**<span className="parameter-name">errors</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>Array&lt;ActorRefWithDeprecatedState&lt;FileUploadContext, { type: "ADD", file: File, id: string, bucketId: string, name: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_PROGRESS", progress: number, loaded: number, additions: number } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_DONE", id: string, bucketId: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_ERROR", error: ErrorPayload } &#124; { type: "CANCEL" } &#124; { type: "DESTROY" } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD", file: File, id: string, name: string, bucketId: string } &amp; FileUploadConfig, { value: any, context: FileUploadContext }, ResolveTypegenMeta&lt;Typegen0, { type: "ADD", file: File, id: string, bucketId: string, name: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_PROGRESS", progress: number, loaded: number, additions: number } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_DONE", id: string, bucketId: string } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD_ERROR", error: ErrorPayload } &#124; { type: "CANCEL" } &#124; { type: "DESTROY" } &#124; { type: "UPLOAD", file: File, id: string, name: string, bucketId: string } &amp; FileUploadConfig, BaseActionObject, ServiceMap&gt;&gt;&gt;</code>

Returns the list of file uploads that have failed

---

**<span className="parameter-name">isUploaded</span>** <span className="optional-status">required</span> <code>boolean</code>

Returns `true` when all the files have been successfully uploaded.

---
